articles.title: Suspect in fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk not cooperating with investigators
articles.description: The individual suspected of assassinating conservative activist Charlie Kirk is reportedly not cooperating with law enforcement officials in Utah. This development comes as the investigation into the motive behind the high-profile shooting continues, and a University of Toronto professor has been placed on leave following comments made about the incident.

articles.title: 'The Pitt' and 'The Studio' take top honors at the 2025 Emmy Awards
articles.description: The 2025 Emmy Awards saw 'The Pitt' and 'The Studio' win the top awards for drama and comedy series, respectively. The ceremony celebrated the best in television, with other notable winners including Seth Rogen and the show 'Adolescence' which dominated its categories.

articles.title: Fox News host Brian Kilmeade apologizes for controversial comments
articles.description: Fox News host Brian Kilmeade has issued an apology after saying that mentally ill homeless people should be 'executed.' The comments, made on his radio show, drew widespread criticism, leading to the public apology.
